means: 畏缩不前，犹豫( balk的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He picked up a stone and let fly at the balking dog.
sentence.Network_cn: 他捡起一块石头朝那狂吠的狗扔去.

sentence.Network_en: Democrats won't pass the plan without votes from rank - and - file Republicans andof - and - file Republicans were reportedly balking.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有普通共和党议员的支持,民主党人无法通过这项方案 —— 到周四晚间,据悉那些普通共和党人在阻挡(该计划).

错组织疵 (Harness Balk) - 这种织物缺陷是由于织布机通丝没有能够按照规定的序列来进行移动所造成的结果，从而导致纬纱在本来应 …

entry.def: If you balk at something, you definitely do not want to do it or to let it happen.

example.ex: Even biology undergraduates may balk at animal experiments...
example.tran: 面对动物实验，哪怕是生物专业的大学生也会畏缩。

example.ex: Last October the bank balked, alarmed that a $24m profit had turned into a $20m deficit.
example.tran: 去年10月，由于对2,400万美元的利润变成了2,000万的亏损感到担心，这家银行畏缩了。

means.word_mean: 1. stopping short and refusing to go on;

auth_sentence.content: But Europe's economic powerhouse, Germany, is balking.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Europe's economic powerhouse, Germany, is balking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Europe's economic powerhouse, Germany, is balking.

auth_sentence.content: Now Mr. Zardari is balking at India's demand to turn over suspects.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now Mr. Zardari is balking at India's demand to turn over suspects.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now Mr. Zardari is balking at India's demand to turn over suspects.

auth_sentence.content: When it came to buying the Gottlieb, however, Rockefeller kept balking.
auth_sentence.res_content: When it came to buying the Gottlieb, however, Rockefeller kept balking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When it came to buying the Gottlieb, however, Rockefeller kept balking.
